item.title: Microsoft Purview: Configuring a Data Loss Prevention Policy
item.description: Organizations have sensitive information under their control, such as credit card numbers or social security numbers. To protect this sensitive information and reduce risk, organizations need a way to prevent users from sharing it with people who shouldn’t have it. This practice is known as data loss prevention (DLP). In this article, I will explain how to configure it.
